author: ChatGPT
content: Here is the English translation of your email: --- Subject: Access Restriction and User Registration Request Dear Manager Chris, When an unauthorized person attempts to access the Partner's Area , please ensure they are redirected to a form request page instead. Additionally, could you please register our team leader, jhkim pittasoft.com , as a user? Thank you very much. Best regards, Moon Je-won --- Would you like me to make it sound more formal or professional?
